Articles.Content:
This is my attempt to create a Sky Crane using Stock Parts along with Modded Parts. 

Here it is: [http://kerbal.curseforge.com/shareables/229079-sky-crane-mk1-unmanned](http://kerbal.curseforge.com/shareables/229079-sky-crane-mk1-unmanned)

The link above takes you to my project page. Let me know what you think and what improvements can be made. I will try to include them when i have spare time.

Skycrane Mk1

------------

Created By: Gyrffen9971 

Copyright ©2015, Gyrffen9971

Specs

--------

Skycrane Mk1 Mission

---------------------

The Skycrane Mk1 is used for taking Heavy rovers' into orbit and land at there intended location. It can detach and take-off again to leave the rover behind safely.

Vessel

--------

Mass: 24,750kg (26.0t)

Delta-V: 38,483m/s

TWR: 8.26 (By Itself)

Atmo^V: 38,483m/s

Height: 7.7m

Width: 10.2m

Length: 10.2m

Parts: 45

Resources

---------

Electric Charge: 35.0

Reserve Power: 100.0

Monopropellant: 750 (3,000kg)

Deuterium Fuel: 8,0000 (8,000kg) "2,000 per tank"

Planned Versions

----------------

Mk1 (Manned) - On Drawing Board

Mk2 (Mannned) - On Drawing Board.

Mk3 (Manned) - Not yet.(No Kerbal Engineer is ready for the challenge! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) )

Mk3 (Unmanned) - Not yet.(No Kerbal Engineer is ready for the challenge! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) )

Planned Upgrades

----------------

For the Mk1 Manned Version - Command Pod

For the Mk2 Unmanned Version - Adding of Solar Panels and Batteries. Possible Sci-Equipment, Lights.

For the Mk2 Manned Version -Command Pod and all that will be placed on the Unmanned Version.

For the Mk3 version - A Manned Command Pod, More Batteries, Solar Panels, Bigger Engines.

Page will be updated as Testing/Designing/Building continues.

Completed test on the Mk1-a variant and it can lift 75,160kg into a 2500km orbit with about 1m39s of fuel left. The new variant will be coming out shortly.

I have uploaded the upgraded version. It now has lights and a max lift cap value.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-01T17:48:01Z" title="04/01/2015 05:48  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 1, 2015</time> by Gryffen1971**

As of yesterday, all craft are being built by Sky Crane Industries, Inc. There is a new division created and they will be creating Power Stations and the like. This will happen in the coming days-weeks.

Thank you,

Gyrffen1971

CEO/Founder Sky Crane Industries, Inc.
An updated version of the Mk1 Sky Crane will be uploaded today
Most people won't download a craft unless there is a picture. You can use an image hosting website like imgur to post them on the forum with a link.

> 
> Most people won't download a craft unless there is a picture. You can use an image hosting website like imgur to post them on the forum with a link.

i have uploaded a new pic

----------------

Mk1 (Manned) - On Drawing Board. 

Mk2 (Manned) - On Drawing Board.

Mk2-A (Unmanned) - On Drawing Board.

Mk3 (Manned) - Not yet. (No Kerbal Engineer is ready for the challenge! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) )

Will be updating all Vehicles to work properly in KSP 1.0. Engineers are hard at work. ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)

Currently, All Craft are in the Design phase. Will be in production soon.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-05T11:00:36Z" title="05/05/2015 11:00  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 5, 2015</time> by Gryffen1971**
  
update

> 
> Will be updating all Vehicles to work properly in KSP 1.0. Engineers are hard at work. ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)
> Currently, All Craft are in the Design phase. Will be in production soon.

We are currently cleaning up from several setbacks. We will be redesigning all products to work with KSP 1.0.2

Engineers and Scientists are hard at work.

Thank you,

CEO

We have a new launcher that is in the testing phases at this time.

The vessel is called the SCI-Launcher. Here are the specs as of Test Phase 2:

**Parts:**

 116

**Mass:**

 1,353.6 t (No Payload Weight)

**Size-Height:**

 39.0m

 **Width:**

 16.0m

 **Length:**

 16.0m

**Total Delta-V:**

 8911(atmo), 9786(vac)

**Booster Stage:**

4-5m Saturn V Large LF/O Tanks

4-5m J2 5x Engine Mounting Plates (LF/O)

4-Apollo F1 Engines per booster

for a total of 16 Engines

**Main Stage:**

1-5m Saturn V Large LF/O Tank

1-5m J2 5x Engine Mounting Plate (LF/O)

4-Apollo F1 Engines

**Transfer Stage:**

2-3.75m J2 LF/O Tanks

1-3.75m J2 (4x) Engine Mounting Plate (LF/O)

4-Apollo H-1 Engines

**Mods Used for Build:**

Squad, FASA(Apollo)

We will roll out the SCI-Launcher as soon as she passes the next phase and the certification for Non-Kerbal use and for Launch Kerbals into space.

5/29/15 10:25am

The SCI Launcher V1 has passed the payload test. Max cap. is 200t. Recommended carry weight is 115t for a 1250km orbit.

here are the links to the pics:

Please check back, I am now back from my leave of absence.

Insert of photos

To everyone; Please make sure you check KerbalX.com to see what mods were used in creating this vessel/craft. This is to ensure that you are not downloading a vessel/craft and then have to download mods afterwards in order to use it. If, you check first then you can at your choice download the mods and install them, then download the vessel/craft.

I create my craft for everyone to use. I do not know if, you have any of the mods installed that i am using when i create the craft. Please do not leave me a post on curse.com telling me about all the mods the craft uses. I am the one who made it. FYI - i take no offense to said comment, i will still answer. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")

I have removed the SCI Launcher V2 from curseforge and have placed it on KerbalX.com

Please go there to download the craft.

Thanks
I will be uploading a another vessel within a day. It is another variant of the SCI Launcher V1 & 2. It has different boosters and has a fairing to cover the whole upper stage

We at SkyCrane Industries, Inc have started a forum and will link all of our craft files for download at this location and at [http://skycraneindustriesin.freeforums.net/](http://skycraneindustriesin.freeforums.net/)

Our 2nd home is listed below, It is in the early stages so, please give us sometime to get everything in order. You know what it is like to move a pain-in-the-rear. ![:lol:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_laugh.png ":lol:")

[http://skycraneindustriesin.freeforums.net/](http://skycraneindustriesin.freeforums.net/)
Will be working on videos for youtube and livestream on twitch starting in February 2016
We will also be recreating our vessels for use with RealFuels starting in January 2016
